title: Nevin Yanıt Athletics Complex
text:
The Nevin Yanıt Athletics Complex () also known as Nevin Yanıt Athletics Facility () is a sports venue for <a href="athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> competitions in <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> located in <a href="Mersin">Mersin</a>, <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>.
Description.
The stadium, situated at Kocavilayet neighborhood of Mersin, was built in 2010, and renamed in February 2011 in honor of the European champion <a href="hurdling">hurdler</a> <a href="Nevin%20Yan%C4%B1t">Nevin Yanıt</a> (born 1986), a native of Mersin. It has a seating capacity of 4,500.
The complex hosted the athletics and <a href="paralympic%20athletics">paralympic athletics</a> events of the <a href="2013%20Mediterranean%20Games">2013 Mediterranean Games</a>.
